4. After Claire and Bob swap books, Bob has Ulysses and Claire has Frankenstein.

6. After Bob and Alice swap books, Alice has Frankenstein and Bob has Lolita.
7. Finally, Claire and Bob swap books again.
8. By the end of the semester, Claire has Frankenstein and Bob has Lolita.
Therefore, Bob has (B) Frankenstein at the end of the semester.
